title: Isle Royale National Park: Special Use Permits
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us     Special Use Permits              Special Use Permits       The application period for Special Use Permits (SUP) will be January 1 through May 15.   Please follow the instructions in the documents below to apply for a SUP.  If you have questions about a SUP, please contact (906) 487-7178.    Application Attachment A   Risk Release Letter Attachment B     There is an annual non-refundable fee of $50 for a SUP.  Visit pay.gov to pay your fee.
